name: Hand Felted Vessel - Angry Skies mini
description:
This is a hand felted vessel made from merino wool, shaped into one very unique creation. 

This is from my collection of textile art pieces where functionality meets art piece - trully functional art. 

These vessels are meant to be shown off as well as used they are quite sturdy so they can be used to store small items in, or put a vase in it and it becomes a stunning floral centre piece. Or my favourite put it up on the mantel to display and add texture to your surroundings. 

Size is 6 inches around the bottom and height is 2 inches. 

Smaller versions could be made to have a grouping of them, just convo me to discuss.

name: Hand Felted Vessel - Angry Skies
description:
This is the center piece for my "Angry Skies" series. 
This is a hand felted vessel made from merino wool, shaped and hand embroidered and then hand beaded into one very unique creation. 

This is from my collection of textile art pieces where functionality meets art piece - trully functional art. 

These vessels are meant to be shown off as well as used they are quite sturdy so they can be used to store small items in, or put a vase in it and it becomes a stunning floral centre piece. Or my favourite put it up on the mantel to display and add texture to your surroundings. 

Size is 21 inches around the bottom and height is 15 inches. 

Smaller versions are available to have a grouping of them, just convo me to discuss.

Free Shipping if you purchase a grouping of vessels. Just convo me and I will adjust for you

name: Hand Felted Vessel / Bowl
description:
This is a hand felted vessel made from merino wool, shaped and hand embroidered into one very unique creation. 

This is from my collection of textile art pieces where functionality meets art piece - trully functional art. 

These vessels are meant to be shown off as well as used they are quite sturdy so they can be used to store small items in, or put a vase in it and it becomes a stunning floral centre piece. Or my favourite put it up on the mantel to display and add texture to your surroundings. 

These are custom orders. You choose the colors and style of vessel or bowl. I can creat multiplies as part of an installation or grouping. 

Smaller versions could be made to have a grouping of them, just convo me to discuss.

name: Felt Shawl/Wrap
description:
These gorgeous luxurious hand felted shawls are truly one of a kind pieces. So soft and light they are warm without being bulky. 
Using only the best New Zealand Merino Wool and adding touches of Silk and Bamboo fibre they are sure to please.
